description: Returns a paginated list of CIDR locations for the given collection (metadata only, does not include CIDR blocks).

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: An opaque pagination token to indicate where the service is to begin enumerating results. If no value is provided, the listing of results starts from the beginning.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An opaque pagination token to indicate where the service is to begin enumerating results.

nested_items.name: CidrLocations
nested_items.description: A complex type that contains information about the list of CIDR locations.

nested_items.name: LocationName
nested_items.description: A string that specifies a location name.
